welcomeSection.title: Welcome to AUS Sport Club!
welcomeSection.description: At AUS Sport Club, we are dedicated to promoting fitness, health, and sportsmanship in our community. Our mission is to provide a supportive environment for individuals of all skill levels to achieve their fitness goals. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced athlete, we offer a variety of programs and activities designed to help you succeed.
welcomeSection.values: We believe in the power of teamwork, discipline, and perseverance. Our values include inclusivity, respect, and a commitment to excellence in every aspect of our training and community-building efforts. Join us as we build a stronger, healthier future together.

members.name: Mary Yan
members.description: Mary specializes in yoga and mindfulness, helping members find balance and flexibility in their routines.

members.name: Catherina
members.description: Catherina is an expert in strength training, helping individuals build muscle, endurance, and confidence.
